details.name: WCAG 2.2 - 4.1 Compatible - 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value - Table cell row span
details.description: The row span of this table cell does not match the row span of the visual representation of this table cell

error.message: The row span %1 of this table cell does not match the row span %2 of the visual representation of this table cell
